Package it.uniba.main

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniba.main.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the abstraction of a chessboard in the chess game, keeping track of the current state of the game on the board

    • Method Detail

      • listPossibleMoves

        public void listPossibleMoves()
        Lists the possible moves for each player based on the position on the board

      • getMoves

        private java.util.List<Move> getMoves​(Piece.SIDE side,
                                      boolean checkKing)
        For the side player he scans the board and adds every legal move. If the checkKing flag is true, moves that expose the king to check are eliminated
        Parameters:
        side - the player side
        checkKing - flag for illegal king moves
        Returns:
        a list of all legal moves for the player

      • getPawnMoves

        private java.util.List<Move> getPawnMoves​(int file,
                                          int rank)
        Get's all the legal moves for the pawn in the input position
        Parameters:
        file - the pawn file
        rank - the pawn rank
        Returns:
        a list of all legal moves for the pawn

      • slider

        private boolean slider​(java.util.List<Move> moves,
                       int file,
                       int rank,
                       int x,
                       int y)
        Adds consecutives moves for the pieces Rook, Bishop, Queen
        Parameters:
        moves - list of piece moves
        file - starting file
        rank - starting rank
        x - arrival file
        y - arrival rank
        Returns:
        true if the move is valid, false otherwise

                            int fromFile,

        fromRank - starting rank
        toFile - arrival file
